intro: On the same day we commemorate the Holy Prophet Habakkuk.

who: Holy Fathers and Hermits John, Heracleimon, Andrew, and Theophilus
intro: On the same day we commemorate our holy fathers and hermits John, Heracleimon, Andrew, and Theophilus.
On the same day we commemorate the Holy Martyr Myrope.
On the same day we commemorate our holy father Cyril the Phileote, who practiced asceticism in the year 1060.
On the same day Saint Abibus the New was perfected in the fire.
On the same day our holy father Solomon, Archbishop of Ephesus, fell asleep in peace.
